item.title: A better code search experience
item.description: Photo by Annie Spratt from Unsplash Gerrit is a great code review tool. I find it much better than GitHub. Many don’t like Gerrit because they’ve only ever experienced it with AOSP and find it hard to work with the repo tool, not necessarily Gerrit itself. Gerrit has a great and well documented API surface. It has enabled a large ecosystem of plugins with plenty of integrations with third parties.

item.title: To face insurmountable work, smile (An interview)
The stumbling blocks involved with upgrading Gerrit
About Deepanshu
item.description: I am an Engineering Manager at Zendrive, leading the Android and iOS mobile teams. We work on analyzing driving behavior on the roads using sensors on the phone. Hopefully, by revealing peoples’s driving patterns, we can make roads safer and save some lives. It’s pretty cool, I know. I am also an Android Engineer. I started my professional career with Google, working with the Android Studio team. After working for about 4 years there, I started missing India.
